data.Name: Linear
data.Description: A method to estimate Vsh, where the gamma-ray (GR) reading is linearly interpolated between clean (sandstone) and shale endpoints. Formula: Vsh = (GRlog - GRmin) / (GRmax - GRmin).

data.Name: Larionov Older
data.Description: A non-linear method for older formations that corrects Vsh to account for compaction effects in highly compacted, older formations. Vsh Linear (Vsh_linear) must be calculated and provided as an input. Formula: Vsh = 0.33 * (2^(2 * Vsh_linear) - 1).

data.Name: Larionov Tertiary
data.Description: A specific correction method applied to tertiary rocks, adjusting for lower compaction effects common in younger formations. Vsh Linear (Vsh_linear) must be calculated and provided as an input. Formula: Vsh = 0.083 * (2^(3.7 * Vsh_linear) - 1).

data.Name: Clavier
data.Description: A method designed to handle mixed lithologies, often used in formations with complex mineral compositions. Vsh Linear (Vsh_linear) must be calculated and provided as an input. Formula: Vsh = 1.7 - (3.38 - (Vsh_linear + 0.7)^2)^0.5.

data.Name: Stieber
data.Description: A method primarily for laminated formations, using a parabolic relationship to better model shale distribution variations. Vsh Linear (Vsh_linear) must be calculated and provided as an input. Formula: Vsh = Vsh_linear / (0.5 + 0.5 * Vsh_linear).
